product_name: Roxy White Wash Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: An all-in-one swim top, the colorful and flattering Roxy White Wash Bikini Top features convertible straps that can be worn over-the-shoulder or cross-back for great versatility and range of motion. 73% recycled nylon and 27% spandex tricot is chlorine-resistant, lightweight and quick-drying. Adjustable chest band and removable cups customize the fit. UPF 50+ sun protection. The Roxy White Wash Bikini Top has a keyhole detail with self fabric tie at the front.
short_description: An all-in-one swim top, the colorful and flattering Roxy White Wash Bikini Top features convertible straps that can be worn over-the-shoulder or cross-back for great versatility and range of motion.
